about_the_game:
Prepare for an explosive, high-octane adventure in Rodent Retribution, a fast-paced Doom-style shooter. As a vengeful feline warrior, you're on a relentless mission to clear out the rat-infested sewers. The rats have taken something precious from you, and it's time to reclaim it with the unwavering resolve of a cat on a mission.

In this relentless journey, embody a battle-hardened feline with a singular purpose: to eliminate the ruthless rat infestation in your underground world.

Rat Extermination: Engage in relentless and fast-paced firefights as you annihilate a variety of menacing rats, each with its own challenging traits.

Arsenal of Mayhem: Arm yourself with an array of powerful weaponry. Your guns may start as regular firearms, but they can be upgraded to unleash chaos and destruction on your rodent adversaries.

Subterranean Environments: Explore intricately designed, immersive sewer landscapes, from dank tunnels to hidden chambers and dark catacombs. Each corner holds new challenges and surprises as you venture deeper into the underground world.

Enhance Your Abilities: Unlock and master cat-like abilities that make you faster, deadlier, and more agile. Leap higher, pounce further, and unleash devastating attacks on your enemies.

A Tale of Revenge: Immerse yourself in a gripping narrative as you avenge your fallen feline friend, a victim of the ruthless rat horde. Uncover the story as you delve deeper into the underground world.

Adaptive Metal Music: Immerse yourself in the epic battle with adaptive metal music that enhances the intensity of your journey.

"Rodent Retribution" offers a genre-bending fusion of first-person shooter and epic revenge tale, delivering a unique and thrilling gaming experience. Are you ready to unleash your inner feline fury and reclaim what's rightfully yours? Get ready to pounce into action, explore the depths of the rat-infested sewers, and honor your fallen friend as you embark on an epic journey of vengeance.

short_description: Navigate gritty sewers as Meatball, a vengeful cat on a mission to avenge his slain soulmate, brutally murdered by the tyrannical Rat King. Master strategic bullet time, precise wall grinds, and other powerful upgrades to deliver intense, gory action in this relentless battle for vengeance.
